faqs.q: How to get registered on Amazon?
faqs.a: Go to sellercentral.amazon.in → 'Sign up'. Keep PAN, GSTIN, bank acct, phone/email, pickup address, and brand docs ready. Complete business details, tax info, deposit method, and verify OTP. After approval, add products and shipping settings. Or Use this link and get registered – registration link

faqs.q: How to raise seller support case?
faqs.a: Seller Central → Help (top right) → 'Get support' → Selling on Amazon → pick topic → 'Contact us'. Choose email/chat/call, describe the issue, attach screenshots, submit. Track under 'Case log'.
Visit sellercentral.amazon.in → Sign in with your registered email/phone and password. If SSO/2FA enabled, enter OTP. Trouble? Use 'Forgot password' and ensure the correct marketplace (IN).

Inventory → Manage All Inventory → search SKU → 'Edit' → 'Offer' tab. Update 'Your price' and 'Quantity' then Save. For bulk: Inventory → Add Products via Upload → Price/Inventory file → upload, or use API – integration for getting inventory and pricing updates automatically.
Orders → Manage Orders → 'Pending/Unshipped/Cancelled'. Click an order ID to view details, print invoice/packing slip, and confirm dispatch.

Settings → Shipping → Create/Edit template. Set service levels, regions/pincodes, handling time, and fees (if applicable). Assign SKUs via 'Manage Inventory' → 'Edit' offer → choose template.
Settings → Notification Preferences. Enable email/SMS/app alerts for orders, returns, performance. In-app: Bell icon on top right
